entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
